ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.model
Class ServerRecipe

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.model.ServerRecipe

public class ServerRecipe
extends java.lang.Object

A recipe class that can be written directly to the server -- ie. rather than storing images as a Bitmap it encodes them as a string using Base64 encoding. Also provides functionality for converting a ServerRecipe to a regular recipe which can be utilized by the rest of the program.

Author:
Marko Babic
